item.title: The Next Chapter of the Web
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The internet’s ‘original sin’ was the lack of a native payment layer. This report explores x402, a new protocol that utilizes the HTTP 402 status code to enable instant, autonomous stablecoin payments for AI agents and the modern web.

item.title: Splix
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A white-label ‘Transact-Now-Pay-Later’ platform that empowers merchants to offer branded installment plans.

item.title: CashBux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A joint venture between UBX and AllBank that empowers MSMEs to act as ‘mobile ATMs’ offering cash withdrawals, bill payments, and card acceptance in underbanked communities.

item.title: The Future of Finance: All About Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An overview of how Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance are converging to reshape the global financial landscape.

item.title: Dragonpay
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading alternative payment gateway that pioneered the aggregation of over 50,000 physical and digital payment channels, bridging the gap between the unbanked population and e-commerce.

item.title: Bux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The UBX-backed payment gateway that boasts the country’s widest network of digital and over 50,000 over-the-counter payment touchpoints, bridging the gap between even cash-based consumers and the digital economy.
